Binnacle is a highly scalable event-driven service and messaging platform. Currently in Beta, Binnacle was built by me using Ruby, Rails, Groovy, DropWizard, Cassandra, JGroups, Atmosphere (http://async-io.org/).

- Drives the company vision and communicates from the top-down and bottom-up.
